hero.subHeadline: It's Time to Embrace Your Destiny. Welcome to ShitHead.
hero.paragraph: In the world of crypto, everyone's a genius. Technical analysts, on-chain wizards, Web3 visionaries. But we all know the truth. Deep down, inside our skulls... is just a pile of shit ideas. $SHEAD is the first coin that celebrates this raw honesty. This isn't a coin for geniuses. This is a coin for us. The ShitHeads.

philosophy.title: OUR SHIT-LOSOPHY
philosophy.paragraph:
Tired of 'revolutionary' projects that end up being a rugpull? Sick of hundred-page roadmaps that go nowhere? So are we.

ShitHead ($SHEAD) was born from brutal honesty: most of our investment decisions are based on gut feelings, FOMO, and pure dumb luck. We don't offer 'future utility' or 'disruptive blockchain solutions.' We offer one thing: a community where you can be yourself—a degen who is proud of their stupid decisions.

points.title: Radical Honesty
points.description: We know this is a bad idea. You know this is a bad idea. That's the whole point.

points.title: Community Power
points.description: A single ShitHead might be weak, but thousands of ShitHeads united can move markets.

points.title: Pure Meme, Zero Bullshit
points.description: Our value comes only from how loud, crazy, and big our community gets. No empty promises here.

shitonomics.title: SHITONOMICS: AS SIMPLE AS TAKING A DUMP

stats.label: Total Supply
stats.description: A nice, round number for our smooth brains.

stats.label: Transaction Tax
stats.description: Being a ShitHead should be free. Get in and out as you please.

stats.label: Liquidity (LP)
stats.description: The keys are thrown into the deepest septic tank. This coin is fully community-owned.

stats.label: Contract Ownership
stats.description: No one can change the rules. Not even its creator.

phases.title: The Flush
tasks: Build the Telegram & Twitter communities until they're full of ShitHeads.
Make the world aware of our existence.

phases.title: The Clog
tasks: Viral meme campaign: 'Tag a friend who's a ShitHead.'
Partner with the most degenerate crypto influencers.

phases.title: The Overflow
tasks: Official merchandise: 'ShitHead' hats and the X-ray T-shirt.
Charity donation for clean water sanitation (the irony is delicious).

phases.title: The Septic Tank of Immortality
tasks: Reach a completely absurd market cap.
Buy a small private island and officially name it 'ShitHead Isle.'
We all retire as rich ShitHeads, laughing at the 'smart investors.'

howToBuy.title: HOW TO BECOME A SHITHEAD

steps.title: GET A WALLET
steps.description: Download Phantom, Solflare, or another Solana-based wallet. Fund it with some SOL.

steps.title: GO TO A DEX
steps.description: Open Raydium or Jupiter. Connect your wallet.

steps.title: FIND US
steps.description: Copy the official $SHEAD contract address below and paste it into the destination token field.

steps.title: SWAP & BECOME A SHITHEAD
steps.description: Swap your SOL for $SHEAD. Confirm the transaction and congratulations! You are now officially a ShitHead.

howToBuy.closingText: Congratulations on making the worst (or best?) financial decision of your life.

community.title: A PILE OF SHIT IS STRONGER TOGETHER
community.paragraph: Don't be a lonely ShitHead. Join thousands of others in our channels.

footer.disclaimer: Warning: This is a memecoin. This is not financial advice. Its value can go to zero in a heartbeat. Only invest money you’re willing to flush down the toilet and wave goodbye to. By purchasing $SHEAD, you are knowingly and proudly admitting that you are, in fact, a ShitHead.
